Transaction State Context.Deposit State: When users send ether to the contract, triggering the fallback function and increasing depositsCount.
Transaction State Context.Withdrawal State: When the owner withdraws funds using withdrawAll or withdraw, transferring ether out of the contract.

External Interactions.Ether Transfers: The contract receives ether when deposits are made and transfers ether back to the owner during withdrawals.
External Interactions.Cross-Contract Calls: The sendMoney function allows the contract owner to send ether to a target address, potentially invoking that contractâ€™s fallback function.
